name: Christmas at the Overlook (James Smart)
description:
Have you ever wondered what happened to Jack Torrance at the end of Stephen King's horror classic, 'The Shining'?

Have you ever wanted to beat the famous Overlook Maze? Now you can! Return to the Overlook Hotel and discover what occurs there at this festive time of year!

Enjoy an exact recreation of the famous Overlook maze! 

With easy, medium and hard difficulties!

Search for Easter eggs and locations from the classic Stanley Kubrick film. Just make sure that you stay clear of room 237!

***************************************************

Made as part of the three day, Game Dev Unlocked,  'Winter' themed game jam. Subsequently developed to include various small updates and changes.

Have fun!

***************************************************

The Shining - Main Title Cover by Kevin Bias.

https://kevinbias.bandcamp.com 

Written by Wendy Carlos & Rachel Elkind
